headline: SONY COLOR VIDEO PRINTER
specstable:
Manufacturer Sony
Model UP-2900MD
Printing Method Dye Sublimation
Dots per Inch 310 DPI
Other Information Specifications
  • Thermal Head: 1024 elements (12.2 dots/mm)
  • Gradation: 256 gradations for Yellow Magenta, Cyan Over 16.7 million
  • Printing paper size: 130 x 88mm (5 1/8 x 3 1/2 inches)
  • Printed picture size: Max. 1 10 x 80mm (4 3/8 x 3 1/4 inches)
  • Picture elements: 860 x 976dots
  • Picture Memory: One frame
  • Printing time: 37 seconds
  • Inputs: Analog RGB (BNC x 4) Composite video (BNC), Y/C Seperate ( 4-pin S Terminal)
  • Outputs: Analog RGB (BNC x 4) Composite video (BNC), Y/C Seperate ( 4-pin S Terminal)
  • External Control: RS-232 C Remote 1 (Special mini) for optional remote Rm-5500 Remote 2 ( Stereo Mini) For optional FS 20 & FS-36
Power Requirements 100-240 V 1.8 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.567 in (37.0 cm)
Depth 16.535 in (42.0 cm)
Height 4.921 in (12.5 cm)
Weight 24 lb (11 kg)
